column4: hi. i've just performed an upgrade (some weeks after last one) of my 8.10 on my acer aspire one.It worked, but now when I maximize a window in gnome, the the upper part disappear. the title bar does not exist anymore, as well as the buttons for maximizing, minimizing, etc. Same thing happen with xfce. how could i solve?
sounds like monitor does not support resolution, or horizontal hold is off or something....
i can see the upper bar of the desktop environment. just the windows lose their upper frame
in xfce you can see a blank space instead of the frame
